short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unlimited File Sharing, any size,anytype, anywhere, Any-Share

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Any-share is an unlimited cross platform file sharing platform that seamlessly allows you to share files directly on social platforms or to your friends inbox. Generate a link for your friends to access the files instantly at any time. Use this extension to access the any-share website instantly.Any size, anywhere, Any-Share!!
